weekly_top5.name: Northrop Grumman Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Defense-budget/newsflow fades or reverses; breakout fails and price loses short-term moving averages (MA10/MA20) on expanding volume.

primary_catalyst.title: Defense spending / policy-driven sector catalyst (newsflow)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple same-week headlines point to a defense-spending/policy narrative driving renewed attention and flows into prime contractors; continued policy headlines can extend momentum over the next week.

sources.title: Trump's defense spending plans send 'strong' demand signal

risk_factors: Policy headline risk: defense-budget narrative can reverse quickly on political developments.
Gap/whipsaw risk after sharp sector rotation into defense; realized vol is elevated.

weekly_top5.name: Ford Motor Company

target.bear_case_note: Auto/EV newsflow turns negative or upgrade momentum fades; price fails to hold above short-term moving averages after a high-RSI push.

primary_catalyst.title: Product/strategy newsflow + analyst upgrade momentum
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Fresh product/strategy headlines (autonomy/UEV platform) plus recent analyst-upgrade coverage can drive incremental buyers and short-term repricing, especially given high liquidity and elevated near-term momentum.

sources.title: Ford Bets Big on Level 3 Autonomy With $30,000 UEV Platform Push
Stock Market Today, Jan. 8: Ford Rises After Analyst Upgrade Boosts Confidence in Turnaround

risk_factors: High RSI increases pullback risk; a 10% move in 7 days is less common for mega-liquid autos without a discrete event.
Sector headline risk from peers’ EV write-downs/charges impacting sentiment across legacy autos.

weekly_top5.name: Capital One Financial Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Broader financials pullback or negative legal/regulatory developments; failure to hold recent breakout area near short-term moving averages.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst upgrade cluster + litigation/settlement clarity (newsflow)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple headlines cite analyst upgrades and improved litigation clarity; that combination can compress risk premium and drive a short-term repricing, especially if follow-on notes/news hit within the next week.

risk_factors: Financials are rate-sensitive; macro data surprises can dominate stock-specific catalysts.
